original_text: You cannot be greater than our father Abraham, and he died! You cannot be greater than the prophets, and they all died! Who do you think that you are?’
korean_text: 너는 이미 죽은 우리 조상 아브라함보다 크냐 또 선지자들도 죽었거늘 너는 너를 누구라 하느냐

sentences.original_text: You cannot be greater than our father Abraham
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 우리 아버지 아브라함보다 더 위대할 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: You cannot be greater than the prophets
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 선지자들보다 더 위대할 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: Who do you think that you are
